definition[0]: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc
definition[1]: someone in charge of the entrance to a hotel, hospital etc
definition[2]: someone whose job is to carry heavy goods at markets
definition[3]: someone whose job is to look after the part of a train where people sleep
definition[4]: someone whose job is to look after a building by cleaning it, repairing things etc
definition[6]: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags, for example at railway stations, airports etc
definition[7]: someone whose job is to help guests arriving at a hotel
